betterblockoutline.config.general.info.a:
Whether or not BetterBlockOutline §6replaces Minecraft's block outline
In other words, §6whether or not this mod is active
betterblockoutline.config.general.info.s: Whether or not §6block occlusion for the block outline§r is ignored
betterblockoutline.config.general.info.o: The §6color§r of the block outline, in the form of #§7AA§cRR§aGG§9BB
betterblockoutline.config.general.info.f: The §6color§r of the block faces within the wireframe when a block is selected, in the form of #§7AA§cRR§aGG§9BB
betterblockoutline.config.general.info.o:
The §6type of wireframe§r that is used when rendering the block outline
§bLine §r- Renders §6only the edges§r, akin to Vanilla
§dStrip - §r§6Connects the verticies§r of the block, looks cool
betterblockoutline.config.general.info.c: Forces the §6outline§r of the block to always be a cube the size of a block
betterblockoutline.config.general.info.a: Whether or not the block outline is shown §6at all times, unless the HUD is hidden§r such as by pressing F1
betterblockoutline.config.general.info.o: How §6thick§r the §6block outline§r should be, in pixels
betterblockoutline.config.general.info.c:
Describes how blocks that §6occupy more than one block§r, such as §6beds, doors, and pistons§r, are outlined
§bSeamless§r - Each outline is joined together
§aBlocks§r - Render each block separately
§cNone§r - Don't connect block
betterblockoutline.error.noselectedmodif: You have to select a modifier first!
betterblockoutline.colormodifier.info.ac: Whether or not the §6modifier is active§r
betterblockoutline.config.chroma.info.du: Sets the §6amount of seconds§r it takes for the §6chroma§r to loop.
betterblockoutline.config.chroma.info.of: Changes the §6offset of the chroma cycle§r in a percentage from 0-1.
betterblockoutline.config.blink.info.dur: Sets the §6amount of seconds§r it takes for the §6blink§r to loop.
betterblockoutline.config.blink.info.off: Changes the §6offset of the blink cycle§r in a percentage from 0-1.
betterblockoutline.config.tool.info.onsu:
Whether the color is tinted if holding the §6correct§r tool
If false it will tint if holding the §6incorrect§r tool
betterblockoutline.config.tool.info.colo: The §6color§r of the tint, in the form of #§7AA§cRR§aGG§9BB
betterblockoutline.config.tool.info.perc:
How much the color will be §6mixed with the regular selection box§r, from §b0§r to §b1§r
 §7§oThis value can also be thought of as percent divided by 100
betterblockoutline.config.tint.info.colo: The §6color§r of the tint, in the form of #§7AA§cRR§aGG§9BB
betterblockoutline.config.tint.info.perc:
How much the color will be §6mixed with the regular selection box§r, from §b0§r to §b1§r
 §7§oThis value can also be thought of as percent divided by 100
betterblockoutline.config.tint.info.bloc:
The §6RegEx§r that, if matched, will §6apply the tint§r to the block.
Any match will cause a tint.
Input is is ID. i.e. §7minecraft:stone

The §6size of the text§r displayed on the block
The §6height§6 for each line of information, in pixels
The §6color of the text§r, in the form of #§7AA§cRR§aGG§9BB
The §6color of the background§r, in the form of #§7AA§cRR§aGG§9BB
betterblockoutline.blockinfo2d.info.note:
Whether or not §6information about a note block§r, including the tuned note and current 
instrument is displayed, when hovering over §6noteblocks
betterblockoutline.blockinfo2d.info.sign: Whether or not the text of a §6selected sign§r is displayed

Whether or not the §6level of fillable blocks§r, is displayed 
when hovering over fillable blocks, such as §6cauldrons or composters

betterblockoutline.blockinfo2d.info.open: Whether or not the §6state of being opened or closed§r is displayed, when hovering over §6doors or trapdoors
betterblockoutline.blockinfo2d.info.pers: Whether or not the §6the persistence status§r, when hovering over §6various types of leaves
betterblockoutline.blockinfo2d.info.dist: Whether or not the §6distance§r value is displayed, when hovering over blocks such as §6leaves and scaffolding
betterblockoutline.blockinfo2d.info.laye: Whether or not the §6number of snow layers§r is displayed when hovering over §6snow
betterblockoutline.blockinfo2d.info.drip: Whether or not the §6state of being tilted or not§r for dripleaf is displayed, when hovering over §6dripleaf
betterblockoutline.blockinfo2d.info.char: Whether or not the §6the number of charges§r is displayed, when hovering over §6respawn anchors
betterblockoutline.blockinfo2d.info.bite: Whether or not the §6number of cake bites§r is displayed, when hovering over §6cake
betterblockoutline.blockinfo2d.info.aget: Whether or not the §6age of crops§r is displayed, when hovering over §6crops
betterblockoutline.blockinfo2d.info.beet: Whether or not the §6level of honey§r is displayed, when hovering over §6beehives
betterblockoutline.blockinfo2d.info.leve: Whether or not the §6level of light§r is displayed, when hovering over §6light blocks

when hovering over §6any block
betterblockoutline.config.blockinfo3d.in: Whether or not §33D Information§r about the §6currently selected block§r is displayed on the block itself
The §6thickness§r of the lines used in the 3D overlay, in §6pixels§r
The §6color of the lines§r used in the 3D overlay, in the form of #§7AA§cRR§aGG§9BB
betterblockoutline.blockinfo3d.info.infe: Whether or not a §6silverfish§r is displayed on §6selected infested blocks
betterblockoutline.blockinfo3d.info.dire: Whether or not the §eDirection Arrow§r overlay is active
betterblockoutline.config.directionarrow:
The §6type of arrow used§r for the §eDirection Arrow overlay
 §9Line§r - Draws a line with a pyramidal tip
 §ePyramid§r - Draws a square pyramid
 §bChevron§r - Draws a Chevron
 §aSides§r - Draws 2D arrows indicating directions, and 2 squares indicating front and back
 §cSide Arrows§r - Like sides, but without the squares
The hotkey used to cycle the §6type of arrow rendered§r

Whether or not the §6arrows of certain blocks are flipped§r to better line up
 with their §6texture directions§r as opposed to the Direction property
betterblockoutline.config.hotkey.info.to: The hotkey to toggle whether or not this mod §6overrides the vanilla block overlay§r, akin to setting §6Active§r in the §bGeneral§r settings tab to false
The hotkey to toggle whether or not any §d2D Block Information§r is §6active§r, akin to §6changing the 2D Active setting§r to false
betterblockoutline.config.hotkey.info.di: The hotkey to disable all visible §d2D Block Info§r overlays, akin to §6turning off every individual §92D Block Info§6 overlay off
betterblockoutline.config.hotkey.info.to: The hotkey to toggle whether or not any §33D Block Information§r is §6active§r, akin to §6changing the 3D Active setting§r to false
betterblockoutline.config.hotkey.info.di: The hotkey to disable all visible §33D Block Info§r overlays, akin to §6turning off every individual §93D Block Info§6 overlay off
betterblockoutline.config.hotkey.info.to:
The hotkey to toggle whether or not the §6block outline§r for the selected block is persistent,
causing it to §6always render the outline§r that had been selected when pressing the hotkey
